body: Fundital is an e-learning service that offers a variety of courses and tutorials from basic education to all real-life applicable training
you can stream your courses on cross-platforms , all for a low fixed monthly subscription fee starting from R50.00 per month.
Watch on Fundutal website and you can also download fundital app on playstore
Download Fundital app on playstore and you'll be able to download course videos and content so you can whatch even when you don't have mobile data access or internet.

header: Do I get certificate after finishing my courses?
body: Fundital is working with accredition bodies to offer graduation courses in which you will acquire accredited qualification at the end of the course.

header: Will I have to sign a binding payment contract on Fundital?
body: Fundital offers a flexible payment plans, you can cancel your subsription anytime, No stresfull contracts and No commitments

header: Who's eligible for Learning on fundital
body: Fundital is open to anyone looking to aquire advance skill , pass their high School with outstanding results or anyone looking to improve their skills and be outstanding in their Organisation.
